item.description:
Unity of Boston is proud to present the world-class author Mike Dooley will be appearing at:
Christ Church Unity
Brookline MA
Sunday, November 21
1:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m.
$25 Advance $30 Door
He will be launching his new book.
Manifesting Change: It Couldn't Be Easier Seminar

Thoughts Become Things author Mike Dooley offers a practical, visual model of manifesting change, and the ease with which you can do it.
Manifesting Change: It Couldn't Be Easier will be the topic of his talk on Sunday, November 21 at 11:00 AM Service. (No Charge)

Sign up go to:
http://www.tut.com/ev...
item.how_to_find_us: We will find each other inside.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Mike Dooley coming to Boston
